fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic

Class HallOfFameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.HallOfFameHandler

  • public class HallOfFameHandler
extends Object
    The instance of this class maintains the Hall of Fame.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HallOfFameHandler(File hofFile)
      The constructor creates new ReadFromInputStream, WriteFromOutputStream and GeneralTools objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getHallOfFameList() 
      protected TreeMap<Integer,List<String>> getHallOfFameMap() 
      protected void loadHallOfFameMapFromFile(InputStream inputStream)
      This method loads the Hall of Fame from the file and sets it to an Integer,StringList-type TreeMap.
      protected boolean saveHallOfFameToFile(File file)
      Saves the Hall of Fame data (Top 15) to the given file.
      void updateHallOfFame(int score, ActiveGame activeGame)
      Updates the Hall of Fame with the given score; the data will be added to hallOfFameMap regardless of the score but is visible in the Hall of Fame list only if it is in the Top 15.
      protected boolean updateHallOfFameList()
      Updates the updateHallOfFameList object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HallOfFameHandler

        public HallOfFameHandler(File hofFile)
        The constructor creates new ReadFromInputStream, WriteFromOutputStream and GeneralTools objects. It calls the private method loadOrCreateHallOfFame which either creates new hallOfFameMap and hallOfFameList objects or loads them from the given file.
        Parameters:
        hofFile - The file that contains the Hall of Fame data.

    • Method Detail

      • loadHallOfFameMapFromFile

        protected final void loadHallOfFameMapFromFile(InputStream inputStream)
        This method loads the Hall of Fame from the file and sets it to an Integer,StringList-type TreeMap. It calls the updateHallOfFameList() method. If either IOException or NullPointerException occurs, new hallOfFameMap and hallOfFameList objects are created.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The file where the Hall of Fame is located.

      • updateHallOfFame

        public void updateHallOfFame(int score,
                             ActiveGame activeGame)
        Updates the Hall of Fame with the given score; the data will be added to hallOfFameMap regardless of the score but is visible in the Hall of Fame list only if it is in the Top 15.
        Parameters:
        score - The end score of the active game.
        activeGame - ActiveGame given so that a Hall-of-Fame entry can be made.

      • updateHallOfFameList

        protected boolean updateHallOfFameList()
        Updates the updateHallOfFameList object.
        Returns:
        Returns false if hallOfFameMap's lastKey call throws the NoSuchElementException.

      • saveHallOfFameToFile

        protected boolean saveHallOfFameToFile(File file)
        Saves the Hall of Fame data (Top 15) to the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The Hall of Fame file.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the writing has been successful.

      • getHallOfFameList

        public List<String> getHallOfFameList()

      • getHallOfFameMap

        protected TreeMap<Integer,List<String>> getHallOfFameMap()
